title: When Garen Goes full Crit.
body:
https://gifs.com/gif/barrel-squash-device-kR461E
And the enemy team has mordekaiser.

replies.body: You could take this as spin to win eating up the tin can.  I take it as the metal machine of death shredding up the no defense "tank"
leaving it up for interpretation is key
macro.... no, Garen will never leave his tower with Morde standing guard...... EVER
I'm saying on an equal skill level garen will be constantly bullied under his tower and if garen tries to cheese at lvl 1 he would take more damage from minion aggression than he could deal to morde
in case anyone doesn't understand........ the spinning blades is Garen and the tin can is Mord
If a human fell in there, wouldnt it get stuck? Thats what ive always heard

Well, No. If a human fell in there they would die a very gruesome death. That is a steel Barrel that thing Is obliterating.

It would look kind of like these pineapples.
https://gifs.com/gif/machine-destroys-everything-v-1-normal-time-J6wXGD

Whoever told you humans wouldn't get destroyed by it was just trying to not give you nightmares.
also before you think that you could get out after it ate your hand, You can't, even a small one will continue to grip you and pull you in, Until it either breaks or someone hits and emergency stop.
Ah, ok. People told me that it would shred people half way then get stuck. Thanks for the info
I don't care about the interpretation, all I care about is that this machine is cool.
it is a satisfying machine to watch
This doesn't have tons of upvotes because not enough people appreciate memes that aren't instantly understandable :(
This is wrong! The beyblade shreds Mordekaiser, Justice is always victorious over death.
Pretty ironic coming from Hades of all people.
I know how ironic it is. Bad guys always lose, don't they?
